txt.en: 'You return! Most excellent! The farmers will be glad you have helped in their fields, and everyone's toes will be safer now.'
You should bring the craban wings to Adan Rhuvyg.\n\nAdan is in Lintrev.
Adan Rhuvyg has asked you to collect craban wings from the gardens of Lintrev.\n\nLintrev is in the Stoor-vales.
Bothersome birds have become a nuisance in the fields of Lintrev.

'Oh, hullo! You're new here, arenâ€™t you! You have that adventuring air about you, and folk such as yourself always seem to be looking for jobs to do for some extra coin. Well I have coin and job both, if you are willing!\n\n'The gardens are plagued by bothersome crow-like birds. They're very odd looking, they eat all the seed, and they peck at your toes if you try to shoo them away! Do away with the pests, but bring me their wings? I wish to study them in detail.'
